title: Force Motors plans to invest around Rs 2,000 cr in 3-4 years, to focus on EV development: MD Prasan Firodia
description: Automaker Force Motors plans to invest Rs 2,000 crore in the next three to four years on various activities including sustainability and electric vehicle (EV) development. The company aims to bring electric versions of its vans' ranges step by step going forward, with the first electric offering being the Traveller Electric. Force Motors also plans to install a second large paint shop and increase its use of green energy.
